name: LONDON EDT 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA LONDON SAVILE ROW MAYFAIR EAU DE TOILETTE 100ML / 3.38 oz (3.38 FL.OZ). Woody floral eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of mint, sandalwood and iris. It´s a masculine, intense and long-lasting fragrance.

name: SEOUL 100ML
details: ZARA SEOUL 532-8 SINSA DONG GANGNAM-GU EDT 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Aromatic eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of hazelnut, pepper and amber. It’s a modern, sporty and luminous fragrance.

name: LISBOA 100 ML
details: ZARA LISBOA COLOMBO AVENIDA DO COLEGIO MILITAR EDT 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Citrus eau de toilette. The scent reveals hints of lemon, musk and green notes. It’s a fresh, comfortable and sporty fragrance.

name: SEOUL 100 ML + LISBOA 100 ML
details: ZARA SEOUL 532-8 SINSA DONG + LISBOA COLOMBO AVENIDA DO COLEGIO (3.4 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The scent reveals hints of hazelnut, pepper and amber (I) + lemon, green notes and musk (II).

name: SEOUL + SEOUL SUMMER 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA SEOUL 532-8 SINSA DONG GANGNAM-GU EDT 100ML + ZARA SEOUL 532-8 SINSA DONG GANGNAM-GU SUMMER EDT 100ML 2X (3.38 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid includes notes of pepper, ylang-ylang and dry amber (I) + apple, orange blossom and amber (II).

name: 30ML / 1.01 oz SEOUL
details: 30ML (1.01 FL. OZ). ZARA MAN SEOUL 532-8 SINSA DONG GANGNAM-GU Aromatic eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of pepper, ylang-ylang and dry amber. It’s a modern, sporty and luminous fragrance.

name: SILVER 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN SILVER EDT 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). Aromatic eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine and patchouli. It’s a fresh, modern and luminous fragrance.

name: BLUE SPIRIT 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN BLUE SPIRIT EDT 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). Aromatic eau de cologne. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of tangerine, ylang-ylang and amber. It’s a modern, nocturnal and warm fragrance.

name: GREEN SAVAGE 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN GREEN SAVAGE EDT 100ML (3,38 FL. OZ).Hesperidic amber eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity top notes such as bergamot, mandarin and grapefruit, with ginger. Accompanied by notes of lavender, apple, sage and tonka bean. The background reveals incense and amber notes wrapped in cedar wood and musk. It is a fresh, luminous and captivating fragrance.

name: UOMO 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN UOMO EDT 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). Oriental eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, nutmeg and amber. It’s a warm, comfortable and nocturnal fragrance.

name: GOLD 100 ML
details: ZARA MAN GOLD 100ML (3,38 FL. OZ).Woody eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, cinnamon and palo santo. It’s an intense, nocturnal and modern fragrance.

name: GREEN SAVAGE + BLUE SPIRIT EDT 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN GREEN SAVAGE + ZARA MAN BLUE SPIRIT EAU DE TOILETTE 2X100 ML / 3.38 oz (3.38 FL.OZ). GREEN SAVAGE: Ambery hesperidin eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity top notes such as bergamot, mandarin and grapefruit, with ginger. Accompanied by notes of lavender, apple, sage and tonka bean. The background reveals incense and amber notes wrapped in cedar wood and musk. It is a fresh, luminous and captivating fragrance.BLUE SPIRIT: Aromatic eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of tangerine, ylang-ylang and amber. It’s a modern, nocturnal and warm fragrance.

name: SILVER + BLUE SPIRIT100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN SILVER EDT 100ML + ZARA MAN BLUE SPIRIT EDT 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine, patchouli (I) + tangerine, ylang-ylang and amber (II).

name: SILVER + GOLD 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN SILVER EDT 100ML + ZARA MAN GOLD EDT 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine and patchouli (I) + lemon, cinnamon and palo santo (II).

name: SILVER 30 ML
details: ZARA MAN SILVER EDT 30 ML (1.02 FL. OZ). Aromatic eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of neroli flower, pepper and sandalwood. It’s a fresh, modern and luminous fragrance.

name: W/END TILL 8.00 PM W/END TILL 3:00 AM 100 ML+100 ML
details: ZARA W/END TILL 8:00 PM W/END TILL 3:00 AM EDT 100 ML + 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The scent reveals notes of tangerine, pepper and leather (I) + bergamot, pineapple and violet leaves (II).

name: #TOBACCO COLLECTION RICH WARM ADDICTIVE 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA #TOBACCO COLLECTION RICH WARM ADDICTIVE EDT 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Oriental eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of rum, white peony and vanilla bourbon. It’s an intense, warm and luminous fragrance.

name: #TOBACCO COLLECTION INTENSE DARK EXCLUSIVE EDT 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA #TOBACCO COLLECTION INTENSE DARK EXCLUSIVE EDT 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Oriental eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of apple, black pepper and tonka bean. It’s an elegant, warm and intense fragrance.

name: #TOBACCO INTENSE DARK EXCLUSIVE + RICH WARM ADDICTIVE 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA #TOBACCO INTENSE DARK EXCLUSIVE + RICH WARM ADDICTIVE EDT 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. The scent reveals notes of (I) apple, black pepper and tonka bean + (II) rum, white peony and vanilla bourbon.

name: NIGHT POUR HOMME II 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: 100ML / 3.38 oz (3.38 FL.OZ). ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II EDP Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, lavender and amber. It’s a fresh, long-lasting and nocturnal fragrance.

name: 100ML / 3.38 oz NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT
details: 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME // II SPORT EDP Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, lavender and cedar. It’s a fresh, sporty and comfortable fragrance.

name: NIGHT POUR HOMME II + III 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II + ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME III EAU DE PARFUM 2X100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).A collection of fragrances to give the finishing touch to your outfit, whether elegant, sophisticated or bold. Providing a dark and intoxicating touch at night, and during the day unveiling lively and magnetic notes.NIGHT POUR HOMME II, a modern oriental fougère where seductive and warm spices are intermingled with notes of dry woods for an intoxicating trail. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot, grapefruit and lemon wrapped in cardamom, lavender and nutmeg. In the background we find musky and vanilla notes accompanied by cedar wood, amber and tonka bean. A provocative fragrance for the man who defends his carefree personality.NIGHT POUR HOMME III, a woody fragrance that reveals an elegant and fresh character with an iridescent floral explosion. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot and pear, wrapped in iris, osmanthus, coriander and pepper. In the background we find woody notes of sandalwood and cashmere accompanied by leather and vetiver notes. A unique, seductive and irresistible trail.

name: NIGHT POUR HOMME II + NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II + NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT EDP 100ML / 3.38 oz 2 x (3.38 FL.OZ). Eau de parfum duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, lavender and amber (I) + bergamot, lavender and cedar (II).

name: BLACK TAG + BLACK TAG INTENSE 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA BLACK TAG + BLACK TAG INTENSE EDP 100ML / 3.38 oz 2 x (3.38 FL.OZ). Eau de parfum duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of pepper, vanilla infusion and vetiver (I) + cardamom, apple and vetiver (II).

name: VIBRANT LEATHER + VIBRANT LEATHER OUD 60ML / 2.03 oz
details: ZARA VIBRANT LEATHER + VIBRANT LEATHER OUD EDP 60ML (2.03 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum duo set. The scent reveals notes of bergamot, leather and bamboo (I) + bergamot, incense and agarwood (II).

name: VIBRANT LEATHER 60ML
details: ZARA VIBRANT LEATHER EAU DE PARFUM 60 ML (2.03 FL. OZ). Woody eau de parfum. The scent reveals notes of bergamot, leather accord and bamboo. It’s a long-lasting, elegant and unique fragrance.

name: VIBRANT LEATHER BOGOSS 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA VIBRANT LEATHER BOGOSS EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Woody fruity eau de parfum. The scent reveals notes of pineapple, lemon and cedar. MODERN NOTES IMMERSE US IN A TRENDY MOOD.

name: BLUE SPIRIT + SILVER 80ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA MAN SILVER EDT 80ML + ZARA MAN BLUE SPIRIT EDT 80ML 2X (2,71 FL. OZ).Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine, patchouli (I) + tangerine, ylang-ylang and amber (II).

name: 30ML / 1.01 oz BLUE SPIRIT
details: 30ML (1.01 FL. OZ). ZARA MAN BLUE SPIRIT Aromatic eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of tangerine, ylang-ylang and amber. It’s a modern, nocturnal and warm fragrance.

name: 100ML / 3.38 oz FOR HIM RED EDITION
details: 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). ZARA FOR HIM RED EDITION EAU DE PARFUM Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of orange, amber and evernyl. A warm, elegant and luminous fragrance.

name: FOR HIM 100 ML
details: 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). ZARA FOR HIM EAU DE TOILETTE Eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of bergamot, cardamom and sandalwood. It's a warm, modern and intense fragrance.

name: FOR HIM BLACK EDITION 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: 100ML (3.38 FL. OZ). ZARA FOR HIM BLACK EDITION EAU DE TOILETTE Eau de toilette. The scent reveals notes of nutmeg, orange blossom and cedar. It’s a warm, long-lasting and comfortable fragrance.

name: MIDNIGHT HOUR EDT 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MIDNIGHT HOUR EAU DE TOILETTE 100ML / 3.38 oz (3.38 FL.OZ). Spicy woody eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of pineapple, rum and incense. It’s a masculine, citrus and nocturnal fragrance.

name: 800 BLACK 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA MAN 800 BLACK EAU DE TOILETTE 100 ML (3.38 FL. OZ)Woody citrus eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of yuzu, saffron and tonka bean. It is a nocturnal, powerful and intense fragrance.

name: VIBRANT LEATHER 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). ALWAYS STRIVING TO MAKE SOMETHING NEW AND DIFFERENT"Vibrant Leather is the balance between the pacific and romantic side of woody notes and the vitality and intensity of leather." Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather.Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot and lemon, bamboo, leather, patchouli and papyrus.

name: OUD VIBRANT LEATHER 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA OUD VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).A HYPNOTIC LEATHER BLENDED WITH A WARM AND DARK BASE OF AMBERY NOTES AND OUD SCENT“Vibrant Leather Oud is pure harmony between the tenderness of oriental notes and the intoxicating sensuality of agar wood notes.” Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather.Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot, kumquat and apple, incense, geranium, violet, patchouli, oak and oud.

name: INTENSE VIBRANT LEATHER 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA INTENSE VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). A RICH SCENT WITH INTENSITY ACCORDS“Vibrant Leather Intense is the perfect combination between the unique and fruity notes of bamboo and the sensuality of papyrus and sandalwood.” Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather. Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot and lemon, black pepper, Schinus Molle, elemi, geranium and bamboo. In the background we find notes of leather, tobacco, patchouli and oud.

name: BOGOSS VIBRANT LEATHER 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA BOGOSS VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). MODERNITY NOTES IMMERSE US IN A TRENDY MOOD“The first Vibrant Leather for “le benjamin” with its fruity hint of pineapple that gives it modernity, accompanied by cedar notes, adding a woody touch of rejuvenation.” Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather. Woody fruity eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot, lemon, pineapple and grapefruit, patchouli and leather notes.
